value:
$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|So, you've beaten Plumeria...
Now what? What will you do?
How will you escape?$k$pIt almost makes you want to laugh,
does it not? Mortals writhing, unable
to escape their torment...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Grr...$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Do not worry. I will not end your
lives right away. If I did, the pain...
the loss...of my brother would—$k$pRrrraaaAAAGGGHHH! Brother!
Why?! How could you! After
everything! ...AAAHHH!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|You have an idea, Alfonse?
What is it?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Let me ask you something, Peony...
Without Dream-King Freyr...the
Waking Dream should be impossible.$k$pSo, nightmares should no longer
be able to have any effect on reality.
Is that all correct?$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Yes, that's right. But the nightmares
are still appearing! I don't understand
how or why...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|If all that is true, then...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|If all that is true, there's only one
possible explanation I can imagine!$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|What is it? Go on!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|...Right.$k$pSo, nightmares can no longer appear
in the real world, but...nightmares are
appearing here...leaving one solution.$k$p$EFace_Cool|We're still in a dream.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Pain|R-really?!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|This has all been a dream...
From the very beginning...
Everything. All of it.$k$pEver since my mother told us about
the sleeping sickness...$k$pEver since then, we have been
in the dream realm.$k$pSo, even returning to this world,
now, we are still in that first dream...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|...You're saying this has ALL
been a dream?$k$pIf that's true, how can we wake
ourselves up?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|If this IS a dream, we should be able
to make use of this...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|The horn Dream-King Freyr gave
to us—Gullinkambi!$k$pIf we can find the Dream Gate
in this world and blow the horn,
that should do it!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Yes. And we can awaken and
finally return to our reality.$k$p

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Commander Anna, how is Sharena?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|She's resting now, but...she was
up all night crying. She has only
just been able to get comfortable.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|I'm sorry I wasn't here to offer
my support...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|It's no trouble. I nodded off here
and there as I was standing by to
comfort her.$k$pOh, speaking of which, I had
the strangest dream...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|A strange dream, hm?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|...I was a squirrel! Of all things!$k$pSince I wasn't human, I didn't have
any duties stopping me from doing
exactly whatever I wanted.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|You must have enjoyed the
forest freely, then.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Not exactly... Instead I was working
as hard as I could to gather all these
golden nuts from around a tree...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|...Well, I have to say, that doesn't
sound all that strange coming from
you, Commander.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Dreams are mysterious... I mean,
I'm not a squirrel, right? But when
I dreamed of being one, it felt...real.$k$pI thought like a squirrel, and it
seemed natural to be one, and
so I lived the life of a squirrel...$k$pUntil I woke up, at least. But while
in the dream, I never would have
realized I wasn't actually a squirrel.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$pAm I...actually...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Aren't dreams fun? Hearing about
dreams people have is one of my
favorite things... It's so interesting!$k$pYou can be anything and do anything
you want! Unless you're a squirrel,
I suppose...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Yes... You can be...anything...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|...Alfonse? Are you all right?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|I'm... I'm remembering something...
Something important...$k$pI didn't understand it before...
Why I couldn't remember anything
from a long time ago...$k$pWhy the only clear memories
I had were of times I spent
with $Nu...$k$pIn a dream, you can be anything
and do anything you want...$k$pI... I am...$k$p$Sbs150|
